comment.author: 14632334@N08
comment._content:
Mother was killed for sport and head kept as trophy.  The calf is already quite dehydrated and thin (ribs showing). 
 The calf is only a few weeks old.
It is not being fed any sort of formula that would help it survive.
I doubt that the animal lived more than a few days after this photo.
No food, no mother, no future....who'd want to survive ?

There are hundreds of such photos of baby elephants, rhino, lions, apes.....all doomed to some twisted idea of capturing (destroying) a piece of nature and taking it home.

comment.author: 14632334@N08
comment._content:
The second hat? 
Probably belongs to the photographer....it's difficult to operate a bulky, large format camera and wear a wide brim hat...
The original is a glass plate.
Someone had their head under a 'dark cloth'.
